sentences: Jaan kutsuti sügisel pärast keskkooli lõpetamist sõjaväkke.
context: Sõjavägi is an Estonian noun that refers to the organized military force of a country, specifically an army or defense forces. It combines 'sõda' (war) and 'vägi' (force/power). The word can refer to both standing professional armies as well as conscript-based forces, and is used in contexts related to national defense, military operations, and organizational aspects of the armed services.
